entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is introduced as a character who is sleeping and wakes up when he hears knocking.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is introduced as a character who enters the room holding a rifle.

entities.name: the giant
entities.description: The giant is introduced as a mysterious and intimidating figure who breaks down the door to enter the hut.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon is armed with a rifle, which he warns Dudley about.
The giant breaks down the door to enter the hut.
